glsa.title: OptiPNG: User-assisted execution of arbitrary code
glsa.synopsis: A use-after-free error in OptiPNG could result in execution of arbitrary code or Denial of Service.

background.p: OptiPNG is a PNG optimizer that recompresses image files to a smaller size, without losing any information.

description.p: A use-after-free vulnerability exists in the palette reduction functionality of OptiPNG.

impact.p: A remote attacker could entice a user to open a specially crafted image file, possibly resulting in execution of arbitrary code with the privileges of the process or a Denial of Service condition.

workaround.p: There is no known workaround at this time.
